QuestData.Title: Ship Salvage
QuestData.Description: Commander, we are running low on supplies.$b$bMaybe we can salvage materials from that ship you arrived on?$b$bAt the rate folks are coming through the portal we are going to be out of everything by sundown... or moondown?$b$bI'm still getting used to this place.
QuestData.CompletionText: Supplies are getting really low, commander.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow... with all these supplies, we should be back on track.$b$bWe are blessed to have you protecting us, commander.
